sub_title: Program Manager Clean & Emission-free Construction | Founder & CEO Narwhal Rainbow Alliance | Biodiversity & regeneration
summary:
Program manager aiming to make the dutch govermental building portfolio more sustainable by amongst others looking at ways to electrify the construction process. Looking at synergies across different ambitions (circular economy- nature inclusive - water management). Long term over short term. 

Over 7+ years of work experience in both co-creation and multi-stakeholder projects. I am driven by finding the sweet spot between idealism and pragmatism. And like my Biblical namesake, I am motivated to save humanity from the great flood and hopefully positively contribute to biodiversity on the way.

This is my personal profile with my personal believes and opinions, some things might not reflect the opinion of the organisation I currently work for.

treasury_media.title: Circular Metrics For business - Finding opportunities in the Circular Economy.pdf
treasury_media.description: To help businesses navigate the increasingly complex landscape of circularity metrics and find the right circular opportunities, we have published Circular Metrics For Business to provide an overview of several powerful metrics for the circular economy.

treasury_media.title: Circular Kongsvinger - Phase 1 & 2.pdf
treasury_media.description: The Scan encompasses four sequential phases which form a guided process to develop and select the best circular economy strategies for the Kongsvinger region built environment value chain.

treasury_media.title: Avoiding Blind spots- Promoting Circular & Fair Business models .pdf
treasury_media.description: To create circular and fair business models, businesses and governments need to consider and address environmental, social, market and governance blindspots. This report dives into three specific business models within the textiles and electronics sectors—repair, resale and product-as-a-service (PaaS)—to map the potential side effects of circular business models and their value chains.

contributors.headline: Program Manager Clean & Emission-free Construction | Founder & CEO Narwhal Rainbow Alliance | Biodiversity & regeneration

profile_positions.description:
The Narwhal Rainbow Alliance is a charity committed to protecting biodiversity and promoting diversity. Our mission is to unite the rainbow allies and the LGBTQ+ community in support of our cause. We stand for the value of ALL creatures and hope we all find our inner unicorns. That is why we chose the narwhal, the unicorns from the sea as our symbol.

We believe that there is a strong link between diversity issues and biodiversity challenges. Just as every individual has the right to live freely and openly, so too do all living creatures have the right to exist and thrive. By protecting biodiversity, we can create a world that embraces and celebrates the rich diversity of life.

The Narwhal Rainbow Alliance aims to support biodiversity protection through empowering local communities and projects. Since local communities often have a deep understanding of the ecology and biodiversity of their territories. This is knowledge which has been acquired through generations of lived experience and observation.

The foundation also focuses on promoting diversity through education. By using examples from diversity in the animal kingdom, the Narwhal Rainbow Alliance aims to promote conversations in schools about sexuality, gender and inclusion.

Join us on this journey towards a more vibrant and diverse world. Whether you are a rainbow ally or a member of the LGBTQ+ community, your support is vital to our cause. Together we can make a difference and create a world where everyone is welcomed and celebrated.

www.narwhalrainbowalliance.com
profile_positions.title: Founder & CEO

profile_positions.description: The Central Government Real Estate Agency works for and on behalf of the Dutch State. The Rijksvastgoedbedrijf is responsible for managing and maintaining the largest and most diverse property portfolio in the Netherlands. From prisons, airports to formal govermental buildings. How can all these buildings be maintained, renovated and constructed in a more sustainable way? How can we do it in a way that does not release more nitrogen in the air?
profile_positions.title: Program Manager Clean & Emissionfree Construction

profile_positions.description:
Guiding cities, regions, and local businesses around the world in their journey to accelerate and implement a circular economy.

"At Circle Economy, we believe it is time for a new economic approach: the circular economy. Circle Economy is a social enterprise. Together with our members, local governments and world leading partners, we create industrial systems that are restorative by design by decoupling growth and resource needs. We accelerate the transition towards a circular economy by providing insights in what a circular future might look like for a company, a city/region or even worldwide, and by taking them on a journey to get there coming up with scenarios for how to get there. Moreover, we provide a powerful network, frameworks, tools, and experience to the community of our social enterprise to turn these scenarios into reality."
profile_positions.title: City Analyst

profile_positions.description:
We are Fronteer. A very special strategy firm from Amsterdam

At Fronteer, we believe that complex challenges deserve breakthrough thinking. 

Together with our clients and carefully curated teams of external experts, we develop clear strategies and compelling concepts for growth. It is our mission to co-create and ignite remarkable solutions for brands, institutions and the environment. To do so, we have become experts in co-creation, developing and fine-tuning a variety of proprietary tools. This allows us to apply different methodologies throughout the innovation funnel.
profile_positions.title: Strategist

profile_positions.description:
SMO (Stichting Maatschappij en Onderneming) is a foundation that accelerates the realisation of societal ambitions by signalling and identifying issues which require a great deal of adaptability and an integral aproach. As a trusted third party SMO connects corporations, the public sector, science and the new generation, to together come up and implement solutions for societal challenges.

• Formulating and implementing strategy.
• Responsible for 13 projects, which consist of;
CE Booster | We help startups in all stages grow. Together we can boost the circulair economy to build a better future. 
Rotterdam100 | The Rotterdam 100 is a competition in which 100 talents work with companies such as ABN AMRO, CGI and Port of Rotterdam to create and implement Next Economy solutions for the Rotterdam business ecosystem.
Zorg41| Is a project to make the dutch care system future proof by looking at long term solutions
National Trainee Event | A yearly event where more than 150 trainees come together to develop skills and network  
• Consulting with the board which consist of CEO's from the 'oldboys' network and top managers (e.g. Prof. Frits Goldschmeding, Andre Olijslager, Kim Boersma and Freek van Eijk). 
• Coordinating a team of 10 employees.
• Partner acquisition and relationship management
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Organising and assisting SMO projects
• Facilitating dialogue between science and enterprises

SMO (Stichting Maatschappij en Onderneming) is the think tank for the Netherlands since 1968. SMO makes scientific research available to the general public and organises workshops and events on social issues, with the aim of promoting an informed dialogue between the Dutch society and its enterprises.
profile_positions.title: Project Assistant

profile_positions.description: Financial sustainability of national systems of protected areas poses the most significant challenge to meeting conservation objectives worldwide. This challenge of safeguarding funding, can be achieved through several financing mechanisms and sources such as international grants, debt swaps and user fees. During my time at WWF I have researched the potential of a National Landscape Approach for Sustainable Financing of Protected Areas within the context of Brazil and Surinam.
profile_positions.title: Project Assitant

profile_positions.description:
The Erasmus Centre for Entrepreneurship (ECE) is the leading centre for entrepreneurship in Europe. Fueled by our belief that entrepreneurship is the primary driver for innovation, we strive to embed entrepreneurship in the DNA of people. We don’t create companies, we create entrepreneurs through the knowledge and network of the Erasmus University Rotterdam, a university founded by entrepreneurs more than 100 years ago.
